answers.answer: I was induced with my first and was able to do it with no pain meds. I had nothing to compare it to but all i remember was being ok up until i was 9-10 cm thats when the contractions truely became strong for me but within an hour or less of being 9 cm i was pushing and had my baby girl and as soon as it wad ovdr i was up walking around. Goodluck and try to be as positive as possible.
I am currently being induced due to preeclampsia and they started yesterday afternoon around 1 and I am barely at a 4 and it is 6:17 a.m. it is a very slow process

question: I'm 38 weeks and 4 days and ill be getting induced tomorrow I'm kinda scared because I've heard it's alot more painful. Can you ladies who have gone though it give me any advise please.
title: question about being induced
